```bash [npm]
npm install @clippium/core
```

```bash [pnpm]
pnpm install @clippium/core
```

```bash [yarn]
yarn add @clippium/core
```

```bash [bun]
bun add @clippium/core
```

```bash [deno]
deno add @clippium/core
```
